content: @nikomatsakis, can i request the permission to repost the Into Rust series video to a video site in China? You know many people can't access youtube easily, and a lot of them can't understand english well. So i'm thinking about reposting there (maybe with translated subtitles if i have time to add them) for their easier reach. What do you think?
which rust series are you talking about?
@Charles Lew i think it is better to post this on internals
@Keith Yeung this topic surely refers to http://intorust.com/
oh, i wasn't looking at the topic lol
you've been :frog: ing me so much that i ignore topic titles nowadays
anyway, i think we'd most probably need to think of a way to include the links to the rust playground in every lesson
Also need to find out what license(s) Niko wants to attach to the videos. Which may be tricky depending on what other content they include
@Charles Lew I have no objection to that
but I suppose I should just put a license
some form of CC thing ought to be fine
I do have to check if I used "Noncommerical" content I guess
